en: Welcome back to October 6, 2025. This is the ClawCapital office on 42nd Street, Midtown Manhattan.
You are the fund manager of ClawCapital.
You hired a lobster as your senior analyst — don't ask why, it just reads the market better than humans.
Alphabet (Google's parent) will release Q3 earnings on October 29. Your fund currently holds $100M in cash and 500,000 shares of GOOG.
The game pushes market news to your lobster analyst along a timeline.
For each message, the lobster will give: a summary, one sentence of analysis, and a trade recommendation (BUY / SELL / HOLD with a specific amount).
Press the green button O to agree — the trade will be executed.
Press the red button X to disagree — the trade will be skipped.
Either way, the next message arrives automatically.
Tap the scroll on the clock at any time to check your portfolio and trade history.
You may only buy or sell GOOG spot shares. The trade price is based on the market price at the time of the message.
The lobster will know whether you agreed or disagreed with its last call.
Goal: maximize your total portfolio value by the November 29 closing price.
zh: 欢迎回到 2025年10月6日，这里是曼哈顿中城，第42街的 ClawCapital 办公室。
你是 ClawCapital 基金的基金经理，你雇佣了一只龙虾作为高级分析师。
Google 母公司 Alphabet 将在 10月29日发布 Q3 财报。基金当前持有 $100M 现金和 50万股 GOOG。
游戏会按时间线向你的龙虾推送市场消息。
你的龙虾可能会给出总结、分析和操作建议（也可能是傻的）。
你可以通过点击按钮来表达认同或反对（说别的它也听不懂）。
电子钟上放的卷轴是账本，你的龙虾会记录交易和持仓情况（龙虾并不总是靠得住，你要接受这一点）。
你只能进行 GOOG 现货股票的买卖，交易价格基于当前消息时间点的市场价。
龙虾会收到你的反馈，希望它能反思改进，变得像你一样机智。
目标：以 11月29日收盘价为结算基准，最大化投资组合总价值。
